Rails Girls KL - Ruby on Rails

For the first time ever, Rails Girls is coming to Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia!

Sept 6, 2014 9:30am-4pm SAYS Office, Damansara Uptown 1

Hello World!

Code Equality and Code Division are excited to bring you the first Rails Girls in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia! During this one-day workshop, weâ€™ll dive into the magical world of Ruby on Rails.

Ruby on Rails is a framework that you can build web apps on. Some apps that are built on Ruby on Rails are Groupon and Says.com.

For more info, please go to http://railsgirls.com/kl
